function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Participants impacted by an epidemic","Impact":"Projects halted or partially halted, affecting productivity","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to ensure business continuity and project resilience","Technologies":"Remote collaboration tools, virtual project management, and epidemic tracking systems","People":"Participants directly involved in projects, such as architects, engineers, project managers, and construction workers","Owner":"Project management teams and leadership, construction firms, and government authorities"},{"Description":"High percentage of participants directly involved in projects","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission within project teams and work environments","Mitigation":"Implementing safety protocols, promoting remote work where possible, and providing personal protective equipment","Technologies":"Health screening tools, contact tracing apps, and remote communication platforms","People":"Participants directly involved in projects, such as architects, engineers, project managers, and construction workers","Owner":"Project management teams, construction firms, and government authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of business continuity measures for epidemic impacts","Impact":"Vulnerability to project disruptions and economic losses during epidemics","Mitigation":"Developing and implementing business continuity plans, diversifying project portfolios, and investing in remote work infrastructure","Technologies":"Business continuity planning software, remote work platforms, and economic impact analysis tools","People":"Project management teams, business owners, and stakeholders","Owner":"Business owners and project management teams"}]}
